item.title: Project I. Predicting probability of default on P2P loans - Part 1
item.description: This is Part I of the project focused on the exploratory data analysis and Part II focuses on building various supervised models for classification and compares their performance. Introduction The exponential growth of Fintech has been playing an increasing role in shaping financial and banking industries. The Peer to Peer lending (P2P) is one of the products created by the advent of fintech. The fintech technology allowed companies to come up with online distribution channels unlike traditional financial institutions who operate through branches where the borrower would have to walk-in physically and apply for the loan.
